Generation VIII.Sword: Its body resembles polished metal, and it's both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.
Generation VIII.Shield: The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Duraludon’s body is comprised of a special metal that’s lightweight and scratch resistant. It’s also smooth, as though it was given a mirror finish.
Generation IX.Violet: Its metal body is durable but prone to retaining heat. It vents this heat from the slits in its tail.
